text:
Hello, 
Since October 18, 20% of our PCs have this error: “The User Profile Service
failed the sign in. User profile cannot be loaded”. 
We see many TEMP.{DOMAIN NAME}.000 folders in C:\Users\ 
Users are able to log in after several reboots. 
Context : 
- antivirus: McAfee 
- Windows 10 22h2 and Windows 11 22h2 
- Fully updated with latest October 2023 security KB5031356 
Our actions : 
- Verification of Regedit (no .BAK) 
- the service is automatically started 
- SCF + DISM: does not solve the problem 
- uninstalling KB5031356: does not solve the problem 
- Creation of a new profile: seems to solve our problem for the moment but we'll
see if it lasts over time 
- regarding antivirus, we do not have any exclusion, should we provide a
specific one? 
Regards 
--
%40googlegroups.com

metadata.topic: The User Profile Service failed the sign in. User profile cannot be loaded
